lyrics:

well well well what have we here
sandy claws huh
oh im really scared
so youre the one everybodys talkin about ha ha

youre jokin youre jokin
i cant believe my eyes
youre jokin me you gotta be
this cant be the right guy
hes ancient hes ugly
i dont know which is worse
i might just split a seam now
if i dont die laughing first

when mr oogie boogie says
theres trouble close at hand
youd better pay attention now
cause im the boogie man
and if you arent shakin
then theres something very wrong
cause this may be the last time now
that you hear the boogie song ohhh

three bats
ohhh
you might also likeoogie boogie
ohhh

ohhh

oogie boogie
ohhh

seven lizards
ohhh hes the oogie boogie man

oogie boogie
well if im feelin antsy
and theres nothin much to do
i might just cook a special batch
of snake and spider stew
and dont ya know the one thing
that would make it work so nice
a rolypoly sandy claws to add a little spice

three skeletons
ohhh

oh yeah

ohhh

ohhh

three bats
ohhh

oogie boogie and three skeletons
oh yeah im hes the oogie boogie man

santa
release me now
or you must face the dire consequences
the children are expecting me
so please come to your senses

oogie boogie
youre jokin youre jokin
i cant believe my ears
would someone shut this fella up
im drownin in my tears

and now with your permission
im going to do my stuff
santa
what are you going to do

oogie boogie
im gonna do the best i can

musical interlude

oh the sound of rollin dice
to me is music in the air
cause im a gamblin boogie man
although i dont play fair

its much more fun i must confess
when lives are on the line
not mine of course but yours old boy
now thatd be just fine

santa
release me fast or you will have to
answer for this heinous act

oogie boogie
oh brother youre something
you put me in a spin
you arent comprehending
the position that youre in
its hopeless youre finished
you havent got a prayer
cause im mr oogie boogie
and you aint going nowhereembed
